titleStmt.title: Three meditations vpon these three places of scripture, 1 Cor. 2.2 ..., Psal. 6.1 ..., Prov. 3.11,12 ... by Iohn Bulteel.
titleStmt.author: Mornay, Philippe de, seigneur du Plessis-Marly, 1549-1623.
Bulteel, John, fl. 1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.H. for Nathanael Newbery, and are to be sold in Popes head alley at the signe of the starre,

notesStmt.note: Last leaf is t.p. which instead of giving Bulteel's name as translator, gives that of Mornay.--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
